definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
a row/a line/to set in order/to arrange/to line up/to eliminate/to drain/to push open/platoon/raft/classifier for lines, rows etc

sentences.english: I authorize you to hit 'em a tremendous whack.
sentences.chinese: 我授權你們，向他們放一排狠毒的排槍。

sentences.english: I was ushered into a book-lined study.
sentences.chinese: 我被領進了一個擺滿了一排排書的房間。

sentences.english: We are all rather cross, and have rows about luggage.
sentences.chinese: 我們橫七豎八地和一排行李呆在一起。

sentences.english: The row alone consists of five rooms.
sentences.chinese: 光這一排就有五間房子。

sentences.english: The front row of soldiers were mown down by machinegun fire.
sentences.chinese: 最前面的一排士兵被機槍火力掃射倒了。

sentences.english: You thanked her by asking to sit in a row.
sentences.chinese: 而你對她的感恩回報，就是請她坐到另一排去。

sentences.english: The audience stares at the rows of red pixels .
sentences.chinese: 觀衆們瞪眼看着一排排紅色像素。

sentences.english: On the right from the lake there is a restaurant built of tuff.
sentences.chinese: 在湖的右岸有一排凝灰岩建造的房子，這是一家飯館。

sentences.english: Our houses are very special. There are five rooms shoulder and shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 我家的房子很特殊，一排有五間房子。

sentences.english: She can even look at a line of characters and meanwhile read out their stroke numbers, just like reading a text.
sentences.chinese: 她甚至能像讀課文一樣流利讀出一排文字的筆畫數。

sentences.english: Champ launches a T-shirt to a man in the last row of the arena.
sentences.chinese: “冠軍”朝賽場最後一排的一名男子發射了一件T恤。

sentences.english: Along the river bank there is a hedge.
In the middle, the cutlasses lay ranged.
sentences.chinese: 在屋子當中的地方，則放置了一排彎刀。

sentences.english: Guest:Um, i want to buy some pickle cucumber , which shelf does it place?
sentences.chinese: 嗯，我想買點醬黃瓜，但是我不知道它在那一排貨架？

definition: a row/a line/to set in order/to arrange/to line up/to eliminate/to drain/to push open/platoon/raft/classifier for lines, rows etc
numerous and close together/densely packed/thickly dotted/thick/dense
left/the left side/to the left of
middle/center/right in the middle or center/nub
